section.title: User's Guide
section.para: This plugin replaces the three Option dialogs in jedit core: Global Options, Plugin Options and Buffer Options. Now you can access all of them from any of them, since they are available as different tabs under the same Dialog.

Just install it and you'll notice the difference immediately. Initially, you should see the same option panes as you did before, but now there are tabs. This makes it much easier to switch between global/plugin options, something I find myself doing quite often. I only added Buffer Options for completeness, but I find I rarely need it.

The Global Options, Plugin Options, and Buffer Options actions have all been remapped via the actions.xml file, to pop up the same combined dialog (but starting in a different tab). The Combined Options brings up the same tab you were looking at last time the combined dialog was open.
Click here for the detailed changelog.
